Class CaseOpeningView

java.lang.Object
UI.view.CaseOpeningView
public class CaseOpeningView extends Object
View for the Case Opening feature.

This view simulates a case opening experience where users can "spin" through a selection of items and receive a random reward based on item rarity.

The main components include:

  • A scrolling track of item tiles
  • A pointer indicating the selected item
  • A button to initiate the spin
  • Visual effects such as confetti and highlighting

The item selection is weighted by rarity, making common items more likely to be received than rare ones.

      private javafx.scene.paint.Paint gradientFor(CaseOpeningView.Rarity r)
      Creates a vertical gradient fill based on the item's rarity.
      Parameters:
      r - The rarity of the item.
      Returns:
      The gradient paint for the tile background.

    • enableWrap

      private void enableWrap()
      Enable endless wrapping so tiles appear to repeat forever while scrolling. We recycle nodes from the front to the back (and vice versa) as the track translates.

    • startSpin

      private void startSpin()
      Starts the spin animation to select a random item.

      Returns:
